column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Light spirit says : " Everyone , come here !
#Text=I do n't sense any Raava energy around her .
#Text=Besides , she 's not dressed like the Avatar .
#Text=And , does n't the Avatar have ponytails ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Do you mind ?
#Text=I 'm trying to concentrate here .
#Text=And yes , I am the Avatar .
#Text=I 'm just wearing different clothes and I cut my hair .
#Text=" Light spirit says : " See ?
#Text=I told you guys it was her !
#Text=How come you 've been away so long ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I was hurt pretty bad a while ago and lost touch with my Avatar Spirit .
#Text=" Skeptical spirit says : " No wonder I could n't feel Raava 's energy .
#Text=" Korra says : " I came to the Tree of Time hoping to reconnect with Raava and turn on the Avatar State again .
#Text=But it 's not working .
#Text=The last time I was here , I saw all sorts of visions .
#Text=Now I do n't see anything .
#Text=" Light spirit says : " Maybe we can help you get better .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry , but for years , people have been saying they can help me get better .
#Text=Nothing 's worked .
#Text=I need to figure this out on my own .
#Text="
